name: Specifying biomass systems
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session provides case studies and best practice for specifying and installing biomass systems, covering the provision of carbon-neutral heating for space and hot water at both domestic and small-medium scale commercial/industrial capacities.

presentations.name: Specifying domestic biomass: case studies and best practice
Specifying commercial/ small scale industrial biomass systems
Specifying medium scale biomass systems
presentations.speakers: Chris Miles, Head of Renewable Heat, British Gas; Managing Director, Econergy ltd; and Director, Renewable Energy Association (REA)
